sentence.Network_en: Their argument was too metaphysical for me to follow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的辩论太深奥,我搞不懂.

sentence.Network_en: The modern poets have gone back to the fanciful poems of the metaphysical poets of the seventeenth century for many of their images.
sentence.Network_cn: 现代派诗人就其许多想象又回到了十七世纪极抽象派诗人的意象诗中.

sentence.Network_en: These are typical metaphysical questions: What is mind?
sentence.Network_cn: 下面这些是典型的形而上学问题: 精神是什么?
